channel.title: Tyreatta-Scape Oldschool V1.1 (Modified and Fixed)[PI]
channel.description:
Been a long while since I've worked on this. Thought I'd have a browse on Mopar for the first time in ages while I'm off sick from work. I've noticed that the last release I did of this caused a lot of people a lot of trouble. I went through the heap of pm's and tried to fix most of the problems i could find that people were having. Couldn't really remember anything else I never got to the first time I released it, but anyway. This is what's been changed and why I've made it V1.1. Do NOT use Jframe as the main-class to jar it use client. Only did this to fix my mistake maybe to help someone that needs this, and because there seems to be a trend of oldschool servers at the moment.
[ul][li]Fixed D Claw Special[/li] [li]Fixed the cache problem[/li] [li]Redid the quest tab using Lins Cache Editor[/li] [li]Fixed up the Commands Interface a bit[/li] [li]Took out a bug I forgot to long ago[/li] [li]Fixed the Gameframe Size[/li] [li]Made the gameframe non-resizeable (Easy to fix, but looks silly without fullscreen and resizeable modes)[/li] [li]Fixed nullpointer exceptions sometimes spamming because of the way the sprites were loaded[/li] [li]Added HD Minimap (credits to Zion from R-S)[/li] [li]Added smooth shading (credits to Bubletan from R-S)[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]EDIT:[/size]
[ul][li]Smoothed minimap out[/li] [li]Added Enter to login[/li] [li]Small anti-leech i added before actually works now. *See note[/li][/ul]
Original Thread [spoiler][quote="Damoiscool, post:1, topic:545763"]This is my latest source and client I've been working on for the last few months, its not the best but someone might make something out of it. The original base was Fridderscape, I've already gotten permission from him to release this. Put a lot of time in to this, but now I don't have any time to continue it development. Lost interest in this source and revision tbh. If i get free time I'll be moving on to 525 or higher.
[size=18pt][b]EDIT:[/b] This has been [b]RE-UPLOADED [/b]with the attack and defense animations fixed. The skillcape emotes are still screwed. When Jarring the client make sure you set the input folder to the files folder inside the client folder also, set the main-class to Jframe. [/size]
[center][b][size=18pt]Server Features[/size][/b][/center]
[ul][li]Home at edgeville[/li] [li]PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc.[/li] [li]Spirit Shields [/li][li]Most special attacks work correctly, including dragon claws, godswords, vls, whip[/li] [li]Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials[/li] [li]Korasi's Sword with working special attack[/li] [li]Working ring of wealth.[/li] [li]Auto-Join Clan Chat on login[/li] [li]Easy Barrows System[/li] [li]Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed[/li] [li]Re-Written buyItem Method, no lag caused by buying items[/li] [li]Working Overloads[/li] [li]Pk Point Shops[/li] [li]Added most NPC spawns to the base[/li] [li]Good Starter Items[/li] [li]Working mystery boxes[/li] [li]Extra Raredrop table[/li] [li]Auto Cache Downloader[/li] [li]Staff Login Messages[/li] [li]Custom Quest Tab[/li] [li]Server guide @ Home[/li] [li]Auto-Voting and Vote Points[/li] [li]Good XP rates[/li] [li]Decent drop rates[/li] [li]Shared Points System between slayer and pking.[/li] [li]Ability to bank all items[/li] [li]Working Minigames[/li] [li]Working Bosses[/li] [li]Working Turmoil[/li] [li]Double xp weekends[/li] [li]Most bugs and dupes fixed[/li][/ul]
[center][b][size=18pt]Pictures[/size][/b][/center]
EDIT: This will most likely be my final update.
[ul][li]Added 525 Gameframe[/li] [li]Doesn't clear username + password on logout[/li] [li]Fixed the terrible background on loading, no more flames, no more flipping and making the image look spastic[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/29qjmvo.png[/img]
[spoiler=pictures][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2yltfmf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/34gom77.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/7243.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/qspb41.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/xoljjn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/5uebew.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/sv191c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ic5sfr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2nbvuro.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/24bm2c0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/fk4ock.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2i9rxfl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5zo4eb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/8zqjpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/imi3hx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1071f02.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/294pgg2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/s43rl2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/24w6i3p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2je4mrp.png[/img][/spoiler]
Hate/Flame/Criticise all you want, releasing only cause it may be of use to someone. There's no anti-leech but its not bug/glitch free.
Packaged Server + Client download, Cache auto downloads [url=https://db.tt/HVQOerZi]Click Here[/url]
Credits:
Jagex Fridder Sanity Me[/quote][/spoiler]
Picture: (No idea why Bob looks really skinny, bad picture?) [img]http://i.imgur.com/bl2LDAb.png[/img]
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/rs0ocweosd2h5o5/Tyreatta-Scape%20Oldschool.rar?dl=1]V1.1 Package (Client, Source, Cache Autodownloads)[/url]
*If you're actually going to download this and proceed to host it, changing more than just the server name then the anti-leech will be quite easy. Just sick of seeing that happen on the status page. I even logged into one and my login message was still "[Main Owner]"

item.title: Tyreatta-Scape Oldschool V1.1 (Modified and Fixed)[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:3, topic:552775”]Well, looks like we are gonna see hundreds more leeches of this being reposted on the advertisement thread with the name of the server being the only change done.

Thanks anyway[/quote]

I put an anti-leech in there for that exact reason, I just forgot to make it work. Thanks for reminding me!

Read full topic

item.title: Tyreatta-Scape Oldschool V1.1 (Modified and Fixed)[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Been a long while since I’ve worked on this. Thought I’d have a browse on Mopar for the first time in ages while I’m off sick from work. I’ve noticed that the last release I did of this caused a lot of people a lot of trouble. I went through the heap of pm’s and tried to fix most of the problems i could find that people were having. Couldn’t really remember anything else I never got to the first time I released it, but anyway. This is what’s been changed and why I’ve made it V1.1. Do NOT use Jframe as the main-class to jar it use client. Only did this to fix my mistake maybe to help someone that needs this, and because there seems to be a trend of oldschool servers at the moment.

[ul][li]Fixed D Claw Special[/li]
[li]Fixed the cache problem[/li]
[li]Redid the quest tab using Lins Cache Editor[/li]
[li]Fixed up the Commands Interface a bit[/li]
[li]Took out a bug I forgot to long ago[/li]
[li]Fixed the Gameframe Size[/li]
[li]Made the gameframe non-resizeable (Easy to fix, but looks silly without fullscreen and resizeable modes)[/li]
[li]Fixed nullpointer exceptions sometimes spamming because of the way the sprites were loaded[/li]
[li]Added HD Minimap (credits to Zion from R-S)[/li]
[li]Added smooth shading (credits to Bubletan from R-S)[/li][/ul]

[size=14pt]EDIT:[/size]

[ul][li]Smoothed minimap out[/li]
[li]Added Enter to login[/li]
[li]Small anti-leech i added before actually works now. *See note[/li][/ul]

Original Thread
[spoiler][quote=“Damoiscool, post:1, topic:545763”]This is my latest source and client I’ve been working on for the last few months, its not the best but someone might make something out of it. The original base was Fridderscape, I’ve already gotten permission from him to release this. Put a lot of time in to this, but now I don’t have any time to continue it development. Lost interest in this source and revision tbh. If i get free time I’ll be moving on to 525 or higher.

[size=18pt]EDIT: This has been RE-UPLOADED with the attack and defense animations fixed. The skillcape emotes are still screwed. When Jarring the client make sure you set the input folder to the files folder inside the client folder also, set the main-class to Jframe. [/size]

[center][size=18pt]Server Features[/size][/center]

[ul][li]Home at edgeville[/li]
[li]PVP Items such as Vesta, Statius, Morrigans etc.[/li]
[li]Spirit Shields
[/li][li]Most special attacks work correctly, including dragon claws, godswords, vls, whip[/li]
[li]Custom Colored Whips with working anims and specials[/li]
[li]Korasi’s Sword with working special attack[/li]
[li]Working ring of wealth.[/li]
[li]Auto-Join Clan Chat on login[/li]
[li]Easy Barrows System[/li]
[li]Most dupes fixed, most bugs squashed[/li]
[li]Re-Written buyItem Method, no lag caused by buying items[/li]
[li]Working Overloads[/li]
[li]Pk Point Shops[/li]
[li]Added most NPC spawns to the base[/li]
[li]Good Starter Items[/li]
[li]Working mystery boxes[/li]
[li]Extra Raredrop table[/li]
[li]Auto Cache Downloader[/li]
[li]Staff Login Messages[/li]
[li]Custom Quest Tab[/li]
[li]Server guide @ Home[/li]
[li]Auto-Voting and Vote Points[/li]
[li]Good XP rates[/li]
[li]Decent drop rates[/li]
[li]Shared Points System between slayer and pking.[/li]
[li]Ability to bank all items[/li]
[li]Working Minigames[/li]
[li]Working Bosses[/li]
[li]Working Turmoil[/li]
[li]Double xp weekends[/li]
[li]Most bugs and dupes fixed[/li][/ul]

[center][size=18pt]Pictures[/size][/center]

EDIT: This will most likely be my final update.

[ul][li]Added 525 Gameframe[/li]
[li]Doesn’t clear username + password on logout[/li]
[li]Fixed the terrible background on loading, no more flames, no more flipping and making the image look spastic[/li][/ul]
